MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the TD2 postcode area of Lauder. This is reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:27pm. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:35pm on the 12th November
